extensiveDataProcessing.description:
Whether data about this
user can be used (non-anonymously) for more data science!

accountName.description: The AD account name to authenticate

duration.description: How long the banner should be shown (in seconds)

active.description: Whether the banner is active. Overrides start and end date

startDate.description: The starting date from which the advertisement should be shown

endDate.description: The end date from which the banner should no longer be shown

products.description: IDs or requests of the products to add to the container

public.description: Whether the container is public or not

ownerId.description:
Id of the user who will own the container, if undefined it will
   default to the token ID.

products.description: IDs or requests of the products to add to the container

public.description: Whether the container is public or not

userIds.description: Users to fine. If a user is not eligible for a fine, a fine of 0,00 will be handed out.

referenceDate.description: Reference date to calculate the balance and thus the height of the fine for.

startDate.description: The starting date of the event.

endDate.description: The end date of the event.

shiftIds.description:
IDs of shifts that are in this event
per participant per borrel.

endDate.description: The end date of the event.

shiftIds.description:
IDs of shifts that are in this event
per participant per borrel.

selected.description: Whether this user is selected for the given shift at the given event

availability.description: New availability of the given user for the given event (YES, NO, LATER, NA)

vatPercentage.description: The percentage of VAT applied to this item

byId.description: The user who updates the Invoice, defaults to the ID of the requester.

state.description: The state to set of the invoice,

byId.description: The creator of the Invoice, defaults to the ID of the requester.

customEntries.description: Custom entries to be added to the invoice

transactionIDs.description: IDs of the transactions to add to the Invoice.

fromDate.description: For creating an Invoice for all transactions from a specific date.

isCreditInvoice.description:
If the invoice is an credit Invoice
 If an invoice is a credit invoice the relevant subtransactions are defined as all the sub transactions which have `subTransaction.toId == forId`.

amount.description: The requested amount to be paid out

bankAccountNumber.description: The bank account number to transfer the money to

bankAccountName.description: The name of the owner of the bank account

useAuthentication.description:
Whether this POS requires users to
authenticate themselves before making a transaction

containers.description: IDs or Requests of the containers to add to the POS

ownerId.description:
ID of the user who will own the POS, if undefined it will
   default to the token ID.

Whether this POS requires users to

containers.description: IDs or Requests of the containers to add to the POS

id.description: ID of the POS to update.

vat.description: VAT group ID of the product

amount.description: amount of this product in subtransaction

total price

toId.description: to which user the money is being transferred.

Whether this group should be hidden

hidden.description:
Whether this group should
be hidden from transactions

activeEndDate.description: Date from which cards are no longer active

balance.description:

organs.description: The organs that the user is a member of.

token.description: The JWT token that can be used as Bearer token for authentication.

Whether the related user has accepted the Terms of Service
 or is not required to.

date.description: Date at which this user had this balance

fine.description:
The amount of fines this user has at the current point in time,
aka "now" (if any). Should be ignored if date is not now.

The ID of the last transaction that was
present when the balance was cached

The ID of the last transfer that was
present when the balance was cached

post.summary:
GEWIS login verification based on gewisweb JWT tokens.
This method verifies the validity of the gewisweb JWT token, and returns a SudoSOS
token if the GEWIS token is valid.

LDAP login and hand out token
   If user has never signed in before this also creates an GEWIS account.
PIN login and hand out token.
